scripts.predev: echo building tailwindcss... && npm run tailwind:css
scripts.preserve: echo building tailwindcss... && npm run tailwind:css
scripts.serve: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BASE_URL=/geeenesis-mobile BASE_PATH=/geeenesis-mobile npm run build
scripts.postserve: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BASE_URL=/geeenesis-mobile BASE_PATH=/geeenesis-mobile PORT=3850 npm start
